      • editAppointment

        public static boolean editAppointment​(java.lang.Integer appointmentID,
                                      java.lang.String title,
                                      java.lang.String description,
                                      java.lang.String location,
                                      java.lang.String type,
                                      java.time.LocalDateTime start,
                                      java.time.LocalDateTime end,
                                      java.time.LocalDateTime createDate,
                                      java.lang.String createdBy,
                                      java.time.LocalDateTime lastUpdate,
                                      java.lang.String lastUpdatedBy,
                                      java.lang.Integer customerID,
                                      java.lang.Integer userID,
                                      java.lang.Integer contactID)
                               throws java.sql.SQLException
        Parameters:
        appointmentID - is auto generated
        title - the title of the edited appointment
        description - the description of the edited appointment
        location - the location of the edited appointment
        type - the type appointment of the edited appointment
        start - the start date of the edited appointment
        end - the end date of the edited appointment
        createDate - the created Date of the edited appointment
        createdBy - the user that created the edited appointment
        lastUpdate - the last time the appointment was edited
        lastUpdatedBy - the last user to update
        customerID - the customer id of the edited appointment
        userID - the user id of the edited appointment
        contactID - the contact id of the edited appointment
        Returns:
        returns either true or false depending on the success of the query
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - throws a exception if the query was unable to execute successfully
        See Also:
        EditAppointment.editAppointment(Appointment)

        public static boolean addAppointment​(java.lang.Integer appointmentID,
                                     java.lang.String title,
                                     java.lang.String description,
                                     java.lang.String location,
                                     java.lang.String type,
                                     java.time.LocalDateTime start,
                                     java.time.LocalDateTime end,
                                     java.time.LocalDateTime createDate,
                                     java.lang.String createdBy,
                                     java.time.LocalDateTime lastUpdate,
                                     java.lang.String lastUpdatedBy,
                                     java.lang.Integer customerID,
                                     java.lang.Integer userID,
                                     java.lang.Integer contactID)
        Connect to the DB and add a new appointment
        Parameters:
        appointmentID - the appointment id of the new appointment
        title - the title of the new appointment
        description - the description of the new appointment
        location - the location of the new appointment
        type - the type of the new appointment
        start - the start date of the new appointment
        end - the end date of the new appointment
        createDate - the created date of the new appointment
        createdBy - the user that created the new appointment
        lastUpdate - the last time it was updated
        lastUpdatedBy - the last person to update
        customerID - the customer id of the new appointment
        userID - the user id of the new appointment
        contactID - the contact id of the new appointment
        Returns:
        returns either true or false depending on the success of the query
